contextId.occurrenceNote: This is a musical instrument with a head like a drum that can be hit and with pieces of metal around the side that sound when the instrument is shaken. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-unknown]])
This is a type of tree. Alternate translation: "a large shade tree" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-unknown]])
